name: wufoo-theme
description: Eddy's CSS Theme for Wufoo Forms

scripts.bootstrap: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && husky install && chmod +x .husky/*
scripts.bootstrap-frozen: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && husky install && chmod +x .husky/*
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && node-sass src/scss --output dist/css --output-style compressed && postcss dist/css/styles.css --use=autoprefixer --output=dist/css/styles.css --no-map && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
